label: 官幣社
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Shintō shrine so important that at the time certain great Shintō festivals were celebrated, the Department of Shintō (Jingikan) sent officials to make offerings to the Deities (hōbei) of these shrines. [神道、神祇官、奉幣]
